detailScreen.webtoonTitle: Lore Olympus Webtoon: Jaw Dropping Seen on Media
detailScreen.creator: Rachel Smith
detailScreen.description: Dive into the intricate world of 'Lore Olympus,' where ancient myths collide with modern story, exploring power, love, trauma, and identity in captivating ways.

mainCharacters.name: Hades
mainCharacters.description: Hades, the God of the underworld, takes center stage. Often depicted as a handsome blue man in a business suit, he runs the Underworld Corporation and serves as the older brother of Zeus and Poseidon.

mainCharacters.name: Persephone
mainCharacters.description: Persephone, the goddess of spring, is the story’s heroine. Portrayed as innocent and naive at first, her character develops dramatically as she faces more challenges.

mainCharacters.name: Zeus
mainCharacters.description: Zeus, the king of the gods, is known for his promiscuity and egotism, which often bring chaos to Olympus.

mainCharacters.name: Poseidon
mainCharacters.description: Poseidon, the God of the sea and Zeus’s brother, is characterized by a carefree temperament and portrayed with green skin.

mainCharacters.name: Eros
mainCharacters.description: Eros, the God of love, is a strong, maroon young man and one of Persephone’s best friends.

minorCharacters.name: Hermes
minorCharacters.description: Hermes, the God of speed and travel, works as a soul collector for Hades.

minorCharacters.name: Apollo
minorCharacters.description: Apollo, the sun god, becomes an essential antagonist after an incident involving Persephone.

minorCharacters.name: Artemis
minorCharacters.description: Artemis, goddess of the hunt and Persephone’s best friend, is fiercely protective of her.

minorCharacters.name: Demeter
minorCharacters.description: Demeter, the harvest goddess and Persephone’s mother, is overprotective due to her fears for her daughter.

minorCharacters.name: Ares
minorCharacters.description: Ares, the God of war, has a tumultuous relationship with Aphrodite.

detailScreen.finalWords: “Lore Olympus” is not a retelling of modern Greek mythology; It is a beautiful tapestry of interlocking stories that explore deep themes of power, love, trauma, and identity. Rachel Smith’s vibrant art and nuanced storytelling have created a world that deeply affects readers, offering entertainment and insight. Let us know in the comments below what you think about the modern re-telling of Greek mythology.
